identity.mission: Create a 'Control Room' aesthetic that feels like a high-frequency trading terminal mixed with a luxury asset portfolio. Reject generic SaaS flatness.

headings.usage: Section titles, Asset names, Big metrics

rules: All financial data MUST use JetBrains Mono.

primary.description: Metallic Gold - Use for primary actions and 'Precious Metals' highlights

rules: Backgrounds must be dark charcoal (#09090B), NEVER pure black (#000000) unless for contrast layers.
Use 'Profit' Green (#00FF94) sparingly - only for positive deltas.

dashboard.rules: Dense, no wasted space. Use col-span-X to create hierarchy.

marketing.rules: Asymmetry is key. Leave negative space.

buttons.primary: bg-[#D4AF37] text-black font-bold hover:bg-[#AA8A2E] rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-6 py-3
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-none uppercase tracking-widest text-xs px-6 py-3

charts.style: Minimalist. No grid lines. Tooltips must be dark glass.

inputs.classes: bg-black/50 border-b border-white/20 focus:border-[#D4AF37] rounded-none px-0 py-2 text-white placeholder:text-zinc-600 font-mono

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise overlays on the main background to prevent banding.
visual_enhancers.borders: Use 'Tracing Beam' effects for active cards.
visual_enhancers.shadows: Glow effects instead of drop shadows. e.g., shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(212,175,55,0.1)]

usage_rules: Images must be desaturated or tinted to match the dark theme.
Use 'gold_abstract' for Precious Metals section backgrounds.

freight_sim.usage: Interactive globe to show shipping routes. Background must be transparent.

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text is #FAFAFA or #E4E4E7 on dark backgrounds.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add Manrope and JetBrains Mono via Google Fonts in index.html or CSS.
2. THEME SETUP: Force 'dark' class on the html element. This is a dark-mode-first app.
3. LAYOUT: Build the 'Dashboard Overview' using the 'Control Room' grid (dense, bento-style).
4. CHARTS: Use Recharts. Style them to look like financial terminals (minimal axes, neon lines).
5. FREIGHT SIM: If react-globe.gl is too heavy, use a high-quality map image with animated SVG paths.
6. NEWS FEED: Use a 'Ticker' style layout or a dense list with 'JetBrains Mono' timestamps.
7. FORECASTING: Visualize Prophet data with a 'Confidence Interval' band (transparent fill) around the main price line.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Avoid 'AI Slop' - no generic centered layouts.
Use 2-3x more spacing than you think is necessary.
